what people in the uk are saying about the dvd:
“I can imagine  watching it when it’s three o’clock in the 
morning  and you cannot get the baby latched on ... and 
there’s no one to ask  ... I would watch it then.”
this dvd follows the journeys of women, men and babies 
from bump to breastfeeding. here are just a few of them:
